title: Pakistan court charges ex-PM Khan with instigating violence against military
description: An anti-terrorism court in Pakistan indicted jailed former Prime Minister Imran Khan and several close associates Thursday for allegedly inciting supporters to attack military installations during anti-government protests in 2023.

title: Myanmar to release four Thai fishermen detained after shooting, Thais say
description: Myanmar is to release four Thai fishermen nearly a week after a Myanmar navy boat opened fire on them and detained them for what Myanmar said was an intrusion into its waters in the Andaman Sea, Thai officials said on Friday.

description: The Armed Forces of the Russian Federation continue the operation to neutralise an enemy group, which broke into the territory of Kursk region.

title: Guterres calls for 'serious dialogue' to end surging violence in Syria
description: The UN Secretary-General appealed on Thursday for an end to the fighting in Syria, where a recent escalation raises the risk of further division in the ongoing civil war.

title: Man accused of buying gun later found at Kansas City Chiefs Super Bowl rally shooting sentenced
description: A 22-year-old Kansas City man accused of illegally purchasing a gun found after the February mass shooting at the Kansas City Chiefs Super Bowl parade has been sentenced to probation

title: Good Samaritan Rescues Two Baby Girls Left in a Ditch After Car Was Stolen in Indiana
description:
A good Samaritan rescued two baby girls who were abandoned in a ditch near his Indiana home after the car they were in was stolen.
